txt.en: Lumrog can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should find find and confront Gúrbarash in Lumrog.
A Confrontation With Gúrbarash
Skarding can be found at Thokvist.\n\nYou should talk to Skarding.

'Eagles, and one such as you? Har, now I've seen it all! You think you can brazenly walk right in here and I'll set down my weapons without a fight? You've read me all wrong, worm! Now then, I'll be nice and let you prepare for a moment before I kill you!'

'Now then, the time has come to attack the Gundabad blockade. We know that Lumrog is too well-guarded to attack directly. We will need to even the odds in our favour. Fanglind and I have a plan that should leave Lumrog unprotected.\n\n'If we can confuse the brutes and make some of their numbers leave the outpost, you should be able to strike at Gúrbarash. Defeat worms or avanc in Misthallow and lay their carcasses upon the stone outcroppings near Lumrog. Fanglind and I will take care of the rest.'
Enter Lumrog
Worms and avanc can be found throughout Misthallow.\n\nYou should defeat worms or avanc and gather their carcasses.
Summon and confront Gúrbarash the chief of Lumrog
Stone slabs can be found around Lumrog in Misthallow.\n\nYou should place the carcasses on the stone slabs.
'It is over, and Gúrbarash flees for the distant hills. Lumrog remains only the ruins of a blockade. We have all fought well!'
Talk to Skarding Wargsbane at Thokvist
Collected carcasses ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'[placeholder], I was able to convince some Eagles, including my brother, that the fresh kills you supplied were not a trap. No, not a trap at all: a free meal! When the forces of Lumrog come to investigate the Eagles surrounding their blockade, we shall rise above the mist! That is when Skarding will ambush those unfortunate enough to observe an Eagle feast at close range.\n\n'Quickly now, you must infiltrate Lumrog and defeat Gúrbarash!'
Placed the carcasses near Lumrog ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Lumrog can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should enter Lumrog.
Fanglind can be found at Thokvist.\n\nYou should talk to Fanglind.
Place the worm carcasses near Lumrog ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Gundabad encampment of Lumrog, led by the chieftain Gúrbarash, blockades much of Misthallow.
DNT Troll!
Gúrbarash has been defeated
Gúrbarash appears
Collect carcasses from worms or avanc ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Fanglind at Thokvist
Place the worm carcasses near Lumrog ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Now then, the time has come to attack the Gundabad blockade.'
'It is over. The pathetic Gúrbarash runs for the hills.'
